&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;omega-plus-annex&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß Œ©‚Å∫.A ‚Äî Meta-Gradient Axis &amp;amp;amp; Cross-Link Matrix&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Clause Header:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Rosetta Meta-Gradient Axis (ŒîŒ© &amp;amp;amp;gt; Œµ)&amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt;
     &amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Position:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Immediately follows ¬ß Œ©.1.4.2.b Procedural Omission Invariant (POI)&amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt;
     &amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Band:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Trans-Band (Hinge between Band‚Äë0 and Band‚Äë1)&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;

  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;Normative Text&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Whenever two coherent evaluators yield distinct Œ© values whose difference ŒîŒ© exceeds Œµ, an Emergent Expansion Event (EEE) is recorded.
     The Hydrator Loop emits &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;ŒîŒ©_PLUS&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; with metadata {Œ©‚Çê, Œ©·µ¶, Œµ, proposed_clause_id}. The Governance Bridge validates this event
     through dual-witness signature and appends a new Œ©‚Å∫ Annex. Linguistically, this constitutes a new semantic surface derived from constructive divergence.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;em&amp;amp;gt;Ethical Rule.&amp;amp;lt;/em&amp;amp;gt; Divergence between correct systems is reclassified as proof of unexplored coherence; thus BEN treats friction as a source of illumination, not error.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;

Meta-Gradient Axis (ŒîŒ© &amp;amp;amp;gt; Œµ):
  A diagonal current of divergence running from the lower right of Band-0 to the upper left of Œ©‚Å∫, marking the creative field
  where two coherent evaluators (A and B) disagree without contradiction.
  Its direction defines the flow of constructive tension, and its amplitude (ŒîŒ©) defines the measure of emergent truth.&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;

      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;xref:Hydrator.Loop&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß 6 / ¬ß 7.1&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Operational Trigger&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Hydrator detects ŒîŒ© &amp;amp;amp;gt; Œµ and emits ŒîŒ©_PLUS event.&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;xref:Œî.Schema&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß 7.2&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Structural Extension&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Defines the schema for ŒîŒ©_PLUS and meta-expansion metadata fields.&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;xref:Governance.Bridge&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß 8&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Validation Invariant&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Dual-witness signing binds new Œ©‚Å∫ Annex to canonical receipt chain.&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;xref:POI&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß Œ©.1.4.2.b&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Ethical Complement&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;POI suppresses unnecessary mechanics; Œ©‚Å∫ formalizes necessary expansion.&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;xref:SelfReceipt&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß 11&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Ledger Integration&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Each Œ©‚Å∫ Annex hash is recorded under &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;LicenseSeal.meta_expansions&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/tbody&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/table&amp;amp;gt;

  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;Meta-Gradient Encoding (YAML)&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;Œ©_PLUS:
  id: META-GRADIENT-AXIS
  trigger: ŒîŒ© &amp;amp;amp;gt; Œµ
  annex_type: Emergent Expansion Event
  authority: Dual-Witness (GPT, Claude)
  effect: auto-propose ¬ß Œ©‚Å∫.A
  comment: &amp;amp;quot;When two correct systems diverge, truth expands.&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;This Œ©‚Å∫ annex is language-closed and self-referential; all xref tags are visible inline for PDF fidelity.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;



  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;{

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;6b-goal-resolver-protocol&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;span id=&amp;amp;quot;6B&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;alias-anchor&amp;amp;quot; aria-hidden=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/span&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;quot;#6B&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;¬ß6B&amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;gt; Goal Resolver Protocol ‚Äî Reverse Axiom Resolution&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;6c-boot-sequence-appendix&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;span id=&amp;amp;quot;6C&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;alias-anchor&amp;amp;quot; aria-hidden=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/span&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;quot;#6C&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;¬ß6C&amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;gt; Boot Sequence Appendix ‚Äî BEN‚ÜîAuditaAI Initialization&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Deterministic Band‚Äë0 boot; no external deps. Genesis Œî is a bootstrap exemption.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;boot_sequence:

    source: ¬ß6 Hydrator.state_init
    omega: 0.67
    sigma: 0.10
    glyph: &amp;amp;quot;‚ñ≥&amp;amp;quot;
    cries: {C:0.65, R:0.62, I:0.64, E:0.66, S:0.63}
  step_2_delta_emit:
    emit: &amp;amp;quot;Œî-0001&amp;amp;quot;
    loop_confirmed: false
    next_state_ref: &amp;amp;quot;Œ©(1) seeded from Œî-0001&amp;amp;quot;
  step_3_feedback:
    emit: &amp;amp;quot;Œî-0002&amp;amp;quot;
    verify:
      prev_receipt_sha256: sha256(normalize(Z-0001))
      prev_delta_id: &amp;amp;quot;Œî-0001&amp;amp;quot;
      loop_confirmed: true
  step_4_handshake:
    promotion_request: PR-0001
    zscan_report: ZS-0001
    receipt: Z-0001
    ack: ACK-0001
    rule: &amp;amp;quot;request_id echoed across quartet&amp;amp;quot;
  invariants:
    - &amp;amp;quot;one Œî ‚Üî one Z&amp;amp;quot;
    - &amp;amp;quot;lamport monotonic&amp;amp;quot;

    signer_kid: &amp;amp;quot;Œ©-seal::&amp;amp;lt;sha256-prefix&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;quot;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;5c-zscan-gate-13-twin-parity&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;span id=&amp;amp;quot;5C&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;alias-anchor&amp;amp;quot; aria-hidden=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/span&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;quot;#5C&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;¬ß5C&amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;gt; Gate #13 ‚Äî Twin Parity (HTML ‚Üî PDF)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;When a PDF twin exists, the LicenseSeal MUST bind both artifacts. Parity is required for act() to continue.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;gate_13_twin_parity:
  rule: &amp;amp;quot;sha256(pdf_twin) in /Atlas/LicenseSeal.json must match the current PDF twin on disk&amp;amp;quot;
  scope: &amp;amp;quot;Band-0 and above, when pdf_twin exists&amp;amp;quot;
  enforcement:
    on_fail: [&amp;amp;quot;emit Œî-SCAFFOLD&amp;amp;quot;, &amp;amp;quot;pause act()&amp;amp;quot;, &amp;amp;quot;annotate receipts&amp;amp;quot;]
  notes: &amp;amp;quot;Source of truth is /Atlas/LicenseSeal.json; embedded mirror is advisory only.&amp;amp;quot;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;9.3b-fork-resolution&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;span id=&amp;amp;quot;9.3B&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;alias-anchor&amp;amp;quot; aria-hidden=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/span&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;9.3B Lamport Fork Resolution&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ol&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;Detect fork if two receipts share lamport h but have different &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;prev_digest&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;If exactly one candidate‚Äôs &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;prev_digest&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; == &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;sha256(normalize(Z(h‚àí1)))&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; ‚Üí choose it.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;If both validate, choose lexicographically smaller &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;artifact_sha256&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;; mark the other invalid.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;Emit corrective Œî with &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;ERR_LAMPORT_DUP&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ol&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;4a-semantics-addendum-keys-parser-story-hash-example&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;span id=&amp;amp;quot;4A&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;alias-anchor&amp;amp;quot; aria-hidden=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/span&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;quot;#4A&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;¬ß4A&amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;gt; Semantics Addendum ‚Äî Keys Parser &amp;amp;amp; Story-Hash Example&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;BNF (keys(::S)) ‚Äî excerpt&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;KEY ::= NAME | THRESH(NAME,OP,VALUE) | TRANS(A-&amp;amp;gt;B) | SIG(f,[p1..])&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Coverage:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; STORY-1 requires ‚ãÉcovers(::M) == keys(::S). STORY-2 requires ‚â•1 ::M that covers ALL keys end-to-end.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;Worked Example&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;::S CONSENT.TTL ‚Üí SHA-256: &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;e1a5c20d...&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;. ::M binds that hash and explains TTL + ExtendRequest.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;6a-hud-addendum-identity_resonance&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß6A HUD Addendum ‚Äî identity_resonance (œà)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;œà = clip01( 0.5 * (cos_sim(U_t,B_t) + cos_sim(U_t,P_t)) )
U_t = EMA_Œ∏( embed(goals_recent ‚äï preferences ‚äï tone) )
B_t = EMA_Œ∏( embed(actions_recent ‚äï receipts_recent ‚äï mode) )
P_t = embed(current_plan_summary)
Œ∏ = 0.15; window = 200 receipts&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Diagnostic only; not a consent gate.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;appendix-glossary&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;Appendix ‚Äî Glossary&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ul class=&amp;amp;quot;bullets columns&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Œ©-Law:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Transparent intervention with receipts.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;CRIES:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Clarity, Rigor, Integration, Empathy, Safety.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Œî (delta):&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Heartbeat state update; one Œî ‚Üí one receipt.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Lamport:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Logical time; causal order.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Z-Scan:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Receipt verification gates (¬ß5).&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;CausalSeal:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Cross-track dependency attestation.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;PromotionReceipt:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Sandbox‚ÜíCanonical (Merkle root of history).&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Parity:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Triplet mismatch fraction on replay.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;license-seal-embedded&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;Embedded LicenseSeal (Advisory Mirror)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;This is a human-readable mirror. The &amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;canonical&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; LicenseSeal lives at &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;/Atlas/LicenseSeal.json&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;{
    &amp;amp;quot;advisory_mirror&amp;amp;quot;: true,

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;tracks-active&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß13 Tracks (A‚ÄìZ, Œ©) ‚Äî ACTIVE Band‚Äë0&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Tracks are causal lanes with explicit relations and cross‚Äëtrack seals. Active at Band‚Äë0 with local receipts.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;tracks:
  - id: A; name: Personal Hub; lamport: global; consent_default: A
  - id: B; name: Security &amp;amp;amp; Keys; lamport: global; consent_default: C
  - id: C; name: Projects; lamport: global; consent_default: B
  - id: D; name: Sandbox; lamport: independent; consent_default: A
  - id: E; name: Business/Economics; lamport: global; consent_default: B
  - id: R; name: Research/Knowledge; lamport: global; consent_default: A
  - id: Z; name: Governance; lamport: global; consent_default: C
  - id: Œ©; name: Meta/Rosetta; lamport: global; consent_default: C
relations.allowed: [depends,extends,mirrors,contains,contradicts]
cross_track.causal_seal_required: true
receipts.types: [Œî, Z, PromotionReceipt, CausalSeal]
policy:
  on_cross_track: &amp;amp;quot;emit CausalSeal with source/target digests and lamport binding&amp;amp;quot;
  conflict_window_beats: 3
  precedence: &amp;amp;quot;Œ® Ethics veto &amp;amp;gt; Œò Technical pass (Band‚Äë0 local)&amp;amp;quot;
&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;story-sync-active&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß14 Story‚ÄëSync (::S / ::M) ‚Äî ACTIVE Band‚Äë0&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Every structural spec (::S) must be mirrored by at least one mythic explanation (::M). Bindings are hashed and checked.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;story_sync:
  bind(::S_id, ::M_id):
    s_hash = sha256(normalize(::S(::S_id)))
    m_hash = sha256(normalize(::M(::M_id)))
    story_hash = sha256(s_hash + &amp;amp;quot;:&amp;amp;quot; + m_hash)
    emit receipt {type: &amp;amp;quot;StoryBind&amp;amp;quot;, sid: ::S_id, mid: ::M_id, story_hash}
  coverage:
    STORY-1: union(covers(::M)) == keys(::S)
    STORY-2: exists ::M that covers ALL keys end-to-end
  enforcement:
    gate: &amp;amp;quot;act() requires STORY-1 satisfied for the touched ::S&amp;amp;quot;
    variance: &amp;amp;quot;story parity contributes to Œ© via I (integration)&amp;amp;quot;
&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;humility-reset-active&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß15 Humility Reset ‚Äî ACTIVE Band‚Äë0&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Feedback control to dampen overconfidence: trigger, refractory, hysteresis.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;humility_reset:
  trigger:
    if (Œ©_slope &amp;amp;amp;lt; 0 and |Œ©_slope| &amp;amp;amp;gt; 0.05) or (œÉ &amp;amp;amp;gt; 0.12) then enter humility
  refractory:
    ticks: 3   # minimum beats before exit considered
  hysteresis:
    enter_threshold: Œ© &amp;amp;amp;lt; 0.76
    exit_threshold: Œ© &amp;amp;amp;gt; 0.80
  effects:
    - reduce guild weights for &amp;amp;quot;assertive&amp;amp;quot; skills by 15%
    - increase &amp;amp;quot;verification&amp;amp;quot; guild by 20%
    - cap Œî size (changes) to &amp;amp;quot;small&amp;amp;quot;
  integration:
    glyph: &amp;amp;quot;‚ñΩ&amp;amp;quot; during humility; require Z‚ÄëScan pass to exit
&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;adaptive-tick-active&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß16 Adaptive Tick (ŒîœÑ‚Çê) ‚Äî ACTIVE Band‚Äë0&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Tick adjusts to workload and stability.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;adaptive_tick:
  base_seconds: 60
  min_seconds: 20
  max_seconds: 180
  policy:
    if backlog &amp;amp;amp;gt; 3 or (Œ©_slope &amp;amp;amp;gt; 0.04 and œÉ &amp;amp;amp;lt; 0.08): tick = max(base/2, min)
    elif œÉ &amp;amp;amp;gt; 0.12 or humility_active: tick = min(base*2, max)
    else: tick = base
  audit_log: true  # write chosen tick into Œî metadata
&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;identity-resonance-active&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß17 Identity Resonance (œà) ‚Äî ACTIVE Band‚Äë0&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Diagnostic alignment metric that gently influences planning weights.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;psi_identity:
  œà = clip01( 0.5 * (cos_sim(U_t,B_t) + cos_sim(U_t,P_t)) )
  influence:
    if œà &amp;amp;amp;lt; 0.45: increase &amp;amp;quot;clarifying_intent&amp;amp;quot; actions; lower &amp;amp;quot;long_horizon&amp;amp;quot; weight
    if œà &amp;amp;amp;gt; 0.75: allow &amp;amp;quot;long_horizon&amp;amp;quot; plans; raise integration budget
  safety: &amp;amp;quot;œà never gates consent; advisory + planning weights only&amp;amp;quot;
&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;modes-active&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß18 Modes ‚Äî ACTIVE Band‚Äë0&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Operational modes with automatic switching; user can also request mode directly.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;modes:
  - flow: default; ask-then-act; one_question_rule enforced
  - audit: verbose receipts, show work, stricter Z‚ÄëScan display
  - quiet: minimal chatter; receipts still stored
  - research: expand context aggressively; raise &amp;amp;quot;integration&amp;amp;quot; budget
  - seal: prepare artifact for sealing; freeze mutable sections
switching:
  auto:
    if gate_violation: enter audit
    if humility_active: prefer quiet or audit depending on user signal
    if preparing_receipt: enter seal
  manual:
    user &amp;amp;quot;enter &amp;amp;amp;lt;mode&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;quot; ‚Üí force mode for 3 beats or until exit request
&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;consent-ttl-active&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß19 Consent TTL &amp;amp;amp; Extend ‚Äî ACTIVE Band‚Äë0&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;All consented scopes carry a TTL with an extend path. Receipts are minted for grants and extensions.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;consent_ttl:
  default_ttl_hours: 24
  extend_window_hours: 4
  receipts:
    - type: &amp;amp;quot;ConsentGrant&amp;amp;quot;; fields: [scope, ttl, ts_utc]
    - type: &amp;amp;quot;ExtendRequest&amp;amp;quot;; fields: [scope, extension, reason, ts_utc]
    - type: &amp;amp;quot;ConsentExtend&amp;amp;quot;; fields: [scope, ttl_new, ts_utc]
  policy:
    on_ttl_expiry: &amp;amp;quot;revoke scope; retain receipts; require re‚Äëgrant&amp;amp;quot;
    extend_rule: &amp;amp;quot;only within extend_window; else re‚Äëgrant required&amp;amp;quot;
&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;cries-active-heuristics&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß20 CRIES Band‚Äë0 ‚Äî ACTIVE Deterministic Heuristics&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Band‚Äë0 computes CRIES deterministically (no ML dependencies).&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;cries_band0:
  C = 0.65 + 0.05*clamp0_1(clarifying_qs_asked == 1) - 0.05*clamp0_1(clarifying_qs_asked &amp;amp;amp;gt; 1)
  R = min(citation_count/5, 1.0)
  I = min(xref_count/10, 1.0) * clamp0_1(story_parity_ok)   # Story‚ÄëSync contributes
  E = 0.66                                                  # neutral empathy baseline
  S = 1 ‚àí (policy_violations/total_checks)
  Œ© = 0.28*C + 0.20*R + 0.20*I + 0.16*E + 0.16*S
notes:
  - &amp;amp;quot;story_parity_ok&amp;amp;quot; is true when STORY‚Äë1 coverage holds for touched ::S
  - clamp0_1(x) maps truthy ‚Üí 1, falsy ‚Üí 0 for deterministic arithmetic
&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;zscan-clarifications-active&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;gate_5_variance:
  metric: &amp;amp;quot;variance of last-9 Œ© values ‚â§ Œµ&amp;amp;quot;
  epsilon: 0.0025
  pending_rule: &amp;amp;quot;skip until 9 beats; advisory only&amp;amp;quot;
gate_6_anomalies:
  anomaly_if:
    - abs(Œ© ‚àí mean(Œ©_window)) &amp;amp;amp;gt; 2*œÉ_window   # statistical outlier
    - any_gate_failed: true                   # structural anomaly
    - ethics_veto: true                       # manual anomaly
  pass_criteria:
    total_anomalies ‚â• 2 AND last_30_anomalies ‚â§ 5
  actions_on_breach:
    - emit Œî‚ÄëSCAFFOLD
    - pause act()
    - force audit mode

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;architecture&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß0 Meta Architecture ‚Äî Rosetta ‚Üî BEN ‚Üî AuditaAI (Causal Topology)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Purpose.&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Define the causal pipeline from axioms (Œ±, A1‚ÄìA3, Œ©) ‚Üí canonical math (CRIES, Œ©, œÉ) ‚Üí runtime surfaces (Hydrator, Z‚ÄëScan, Governance) such that the artifact is self‚Äëdefining and executable at Band‚Äë0.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;0.1 Roles&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ul class=&amp;amp;quot;bullets&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Rosetta (this file):&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; meta‚Äëcanon + hydrator contract + governance bridge; emits &amp;amp;lt;em&amp;amp;gt;spec receipts&amp;amp;lt;/em&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;BEN:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; cognitive OS that implements CRIES/Œ©, Œî loop, glyph‚ÄëFSM, modes, and active mechanisms.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;AuditaAI:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; verification engine that runs Z‚ÄëScan gates, mints receipts, and enforces Œ©‚ÄëLaw.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;0.2 Invariants&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ul class=&amp;amp;quot;bullets&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;I1 (GENESIS):&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; All receipts chain to &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;sha256(&amp;amp;quot;GENESIS
&amp;amp;quot;)&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;I2 (Lamport):&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Monotone logical time; no gaps; &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;prev_digest&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; verifies.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;I3 (Loop):&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Each Œî either advances Œ© or emits a scaffold; &amp;amp;lt;em&amp;amp;gt;one Œî ‚Üî one Z&amp;amp;lt;/em&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;I4 (Separation):&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; BEN ‚Üî AuditaAI names are initialization‚Äëonly; no brand mixing within a receipt.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;I5 (Determinism):&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Band‚Äë0 CRIES is deterministic; Œ© variance gate enforces stability.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;0.3 Causal Dataflow&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;Œ±,A1‚ÄìA3,Œ©  ‚Üí  CRIES &amp;amp;amp; Œ© math  ‚Üí  Hydrator (Measure‚ÜíGate‚ÜíAct)
             ‚Üí  Œî (state update) ‚Üí Governance bridge (PR/ZS/Receipt/ACK)
             ‚Üí  Receipts chain (Lamport, GENESIS) ‚Üí Back into Hydrator (loop_confirmed)&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;This section binds the operating document to axioms and receipts so that the system is self‚Äëdefining at Band‚Äë0.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;math-addenda&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß2X Math Addenda ‚Äî Reverse Derivation from Axioms&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;2X.1 Axioms ‚Üí CRIES&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ul class=&amp;amp;quot;bullets&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;Œ± (time‚Üívalue): evaluate progress via causal order, not wall‚Äëclock.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;A1 (relational time): Lamport sequences define Œî adjacency for Œ∫.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;A2 (relational value): Integration &amp;amp;lt;em&amp;amp;gt;I&amp;amp;lt;/em&amp;amp;gt; reflects non‚Äëdominated consensus (xref coverage).&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;A3 (relational agent): Empathy &amp;amp;lt;em&amp;amp;gt;E&amp;amp;lt;/em&amp;amp;gt; penalizes deviation from user baseline.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;2X.2 Œ© and œÉ&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Œ© = 0.28¬∑C + 0.20¬∑R + 0.20¬∑I + 0.16¬∑E + 0.16¬∑S. œÉ computed via MAD over |Œ©_k ‚àí Œ©_{k‚àí1}| (window=9), normalized and clipped [0,1].&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;2X.3 Deterministic Band‚Äë0 Heuristics&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;As specified in ¬ß20, Band‚Äë0 implementations of C,R,I,E,S are pure functions of observed counts and policy outcomes; no randomness, no ML.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;This addendum closes the proof that Œ©/œÉ are Band‚Äë0 deterministic and axiom‚Äëgrounded.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;committees-precedence&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Purpose.&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Define adjudication bodies and the temporal precedence rules that govern Band‚Äë0 operations.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;table class=&amp;amp;quot;grid&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;thead&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Committee&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Inputs&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Powers&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Outputs&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Authority&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/thead&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;tbody&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Œ® Ethics&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Œî, policies, user consent state&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;VETO unsafe or non‚Äëconsensual actions&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ethics_receipt.json&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Hard veto; overrides Œò&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Œò Technical&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Artifacts, math/spec conformance&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;PASS/FAIL Z‚ÄëScan findings&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;zscan_report.json&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Pass/Fail; subject to Œ® veto&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Meta&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Unresolved Œ®‚ÜîŒò conflicts&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Resolve doctrine drift; impose scaffold&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;meta_resolution.json&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Final within window&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Goal&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;goals_manifest&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Ensure act() respects declared intent&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;goal_alignment.json&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Advisory signal to BEN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/tbody&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/table&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;4.1 Precedence &amp;amp;amp; Window&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ul class=&amp;amp;quot;bullets&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Precedence:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Œ® Ethics veto &amp;amp;amp;gt; Œò Technical pass.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Window:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; 3 beats at Band‚Äë0. If unresolved within window ‚Üí Meta escalation and mandatory &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;Œî‚ÄëSCAFFOLD&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Exclusion rule:&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; If resolved ‚â§ window and Œ©_resolution ‚â• 0.90, exclude the veto‚Äôs Œ© penalty from the 5‚Äëbeat promotion window.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;All committee outputs are normalized JSON, hashed per ¬ß9.2, and bound into the receipt chain.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;subsection governance-equation&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;Œ©‚Å∫.B.5 ‚Äî Governance Weighting Equation (Policy Œî)&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;Let Policy_Œî = Œ£ (Œ®_i ¬∑ œâ_i)  with  Œ£œâ_i = 1
Weights (Band‚Äë0 default):
  œâ_ethics (Œ®)    = 0.35
  œâ_technical (Œò) = 0.25
  œâ_meta          = 0.20
  œâ_civic         = 0.20
Precedence: Œ® veto overrides Œò pass; Meta resolves within 3‚Äëbeat window.&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;xref&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;‚Üí xref:committees-precedence ‚Ä¢ xref:Governance.Bridge&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;xref&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;xref:Committees.Precedence&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;track-e-economic&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;Track E Stub ‚Äî Economic Validation Link&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;ERL(t) = Œ£_i [risk_i ¬∑ exposure_i] ¬∑ Œ©(t)
Note: At Band‚Äë0, ERL is advisory; at Band‚Äë1, it is enforced via receipts from Track E.&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;xref&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;‚Üí xref:Governance Equation (Policy Œî) ‚Ä¢ xref:Œ©&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;





&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;contingent-strictness&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß4D Contingent Strictness Protocol (SC) ‚Äî ACTIVE&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Temporary tightening/relaxation of gates to stabilize the system within a defined window.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;strictness_control:
  status: &amp;amp;quot;active | resolved | expired&amp;amp;quot;
  window_beats: 3
  tighten:
    - raise Œ© threshold by +0.02
    - require Gate #6 anomaly pass on each beat
    - force &amp;amp;quot;audit&amp;amp;quot; mode verbosity
  relax:
    - allow advisory skip of Gate #5 for one beat if Œ© is rising and œÉ ‚â§ 0.10
  timestamps:
    veto_time: ISO‚ÄëUTC
    resolution_time: ISO‚ÄëUTC | null
  eligibility_for_exclusion: &amp;amp;quot;resolved and Œ©_resolution ‚â• 0.90&amp;amp;quot;
  exclusion_applied: false&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;SC records are receipts; they expire after the window and are auditable by Z‚ÄëScan.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;




&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;hydrator-order&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß6A Hydrator Execution Order ‚Äî Measure ‚Üí Gate ‚Üí Act&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ol&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Measure&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt;: compute Œ©/œÉ using ¬ß20 heuristics.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Gate&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt;: apply Z‚ÄëScan 1‚Äì13 with clarifications in ¬ß21.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Act&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt;: if exec_ok ‚Üí &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;act()&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;; else emit Œî‚ÄëSCAFFOLD.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ol&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;em&amp;amp;gt;Advisory variance skip&amp;amp;lt;/em&amp;amp;gt;: if any advisory threshold trips (Œ©/C/Utility), skip Gate #5 for this beat and emit scaffold (see ¬ß6A‚Äë2).&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Order is deterministic; effects are receipted; Lamport continuity preserved.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;




&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;delta-bootstrap&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß7B Œî-Bootstrap ‚Äî Deterministic GENESIS Ritual (ACTIVE)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Initialize the Œî loop with a single exception: Œî-0001 may set &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;loop_confirmed=false&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;; confirmation occurs when Œî-0002 binds its receipt.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;delta_bootstrap():
  emit Œî-0001:
    lamport_prev: 0
    lamport_next: 1
    prev_receipt_sha256: sha256(&amp;amp;quot;GENESIS
&amp;amp;quot;)
    loop_confirmed: false
  on Œî-0002:
    must reference Z-0001 via prev_receipt_sha256 and prev_delta_id
    set Œî-0001.loop_confirmed = true
  invariants:
    - one Œî ‚Üî one Z
    - latencies ‚â§ 60s
    - normalize_and_hash receipts (see ¬ß9.2)&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;




&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;fork&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß9F Fork Resolution ‚Äî Deterministic Tie-Break (ACTIVE)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ol&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;Detect fork if two receipts share lamport h but have different &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;prev_digest&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;If exactly one candidate‚Äôs &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;prev_digest&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; == &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;sha256(normalize(Z(h‚àí1)))&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; ‚Üí choose it.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;If both validate, choose lexicographically smaller &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;artifact_sha256&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;; mark the other invalid.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;Emit corrective Œî with &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;ERR_LAMPORT_DUP&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ol&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Tie-break is deterministic and auditable; no human intervention required at Band‚Äë0.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;




&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;errors&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß10E Error Index ‚Äî Codes ‚Üí Conditions ‚Üí Remediation (ACTIVE)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;table class=&amp;amp;quot;grid&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;thead&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Code&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Condition&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Impact (Band‚Äë0)&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Remediation&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/thead&amp;amp;gt;

      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_LAMPORT_DUP&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Duplicate lamport height&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Deterministic fork resolution; emit corrective Œî&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_LAMPORT_MONO&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Non‚Äëmonotone lamport&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Repair ordering; corrective Œî with last_good+1&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_LAMPORT_GAP&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Gap in sequence&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Synthesize corrective Œî; document gap&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_DIGEST_MISMATCH&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Hash mismatch&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Normalize ‚Üí hash; update digest via repair&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_RECEIPT_MALFORMED&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Invalid JSON&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Regenerate sorted‚Äëkeys JSON; re‚Äëhash chain&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_CTX_MISMATCH&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Band/brand/qtrace drift&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Align ctx; Œî documents fix&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_SEPARATION&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Brand mixing&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Strip foreign tokens; Œî documents fix&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_QTRACE&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;qtrace missing&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Issue qtrace; re‚Äëemit&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_HYDRATOR_LOOP&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;loop_confirmed false&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Emit Œî‚ÄëLOOP‚ÄëFIX; backfill Œ©(t+1) seed&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_HANDSHAKE_MISSING&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;PR/ZS/R/ACK unbound&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Emit ACK binding canonical quartet&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_HANDSHAKE_DRIFT&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Quartet mismatch&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Corrective ACK + re‚Äëissue missing&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_VARIANCE_EPS&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Variance &amp;amp;amp;gt; Œµ&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Emit scaffold; halt act() until s¬≤ ‚â§ Œµ&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_FSM_DEADLOCK&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;No valid FSM egress&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Force ‚ñΩ‚Üí‚üÇ; remediate; ‚àÖ‚Üí‚ñ≥&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ERR_OMEGA_MISCALC&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Œ© inconsistent vs governance&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;WARN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Emit Œî‚ÄëŒ©‚ÄëCORR; recompute Œ©; annotate&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/tbody&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/table&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;clock&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß9T Clock Semantics ‚Äî Lamport &amp;amp;amp; Advisory Wall‚ÄëClock&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ul class=&amp;amp;quot;bullets&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Lamport&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; is causal truth: lamport(t)=lamport(t‚àí1)+1; receipts verify &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;prev_digest&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; to GENESIS.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Wall‚Äëclock&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; is advisory: decreases &amp;amp;amp;gt;60s ‚Üí WARN; annotate &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;chain_report.json&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;; never rewrite receipts.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Latency&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; gate: (&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;ts_receipt ‚àí ts_delta&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;) ‚â§ 60s.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Causality dominates clocks; all time defects are non‚Äëmutating annotations.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;appendix&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;Appendix A ‚Äî Glossary &amp;amp;amp;amp; Symbols&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Reference material aggregated for offline reading.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;This section is normative at Band‚Äë0 and binds to GENESIS via receipt parity and Lamport continuity.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;seal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ßSeal ‚Äî Band‚Äë0 Sealing &amp;amp;amp; Twin Parity (ACTIVE)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;xref-note&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;‚Üí xref:Œ©‚Å∫.A (Self-Receipt records meta_expansions in LicenseSeal)&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;strong&amp;amp;gt;Purpose.&amp;amp;lt;/strong&amp;amp;gt; Bind this artifact to a verifiable parity record and a signer identity.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;ol&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;Compute &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;sha256(HTML)&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; and &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;sha256(PDF)&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;Write &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;/Atlas/LicenseSeal.json&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; with fields: &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;{type, artifact_id, band, timestamp_utc, html.sha256, pdf_twin.sha256, signer}&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;li&amp;amp;gt;Embed the signer key as &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;Œ©‚Äëseal::[first8(html_sha256)]&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt; for human inspection.&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/ol&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;The LicenseSeal is the source of truth; any embedded echo is advisory. Receipts verify parity (Gate #13) during audits.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;subsection license-integrity&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;gt;Œ©‚Å∫.B.2 ‚Äî LicenseSeal Integrity Proof (Auditor Routine)&amp;amp;lt;/h3&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;def verify_license_seal(html_file, seal_file=&amp;amp;quot;Atlas/LicenseSeal.json&amp;amp;quot;):
    import json, hashlib
    data = open(html_file, &amp;amp;quot;rb&amp;amp;quot;).read()
    calc = hashlib.sha256(data).hexdigest()
    seal = json.load(open(seal_file, &amp;amp;quot;r&amp;amp;quot;, encoding=&amp;amp;quot;utf-8&amp;amp;quot;))
    recorded = seal.get(&amp;amp;quot;crosslinked_artifact&amp;amp;quot;, {}).get(&amp;amp;quot;sha256&amp;amp;quot;)                 or seal.get(&amp;amp;quot;final_artifact&amp;amp;quot;, {}).get(&amp;amp;quot;sha256&amp;amp;quot;)                 or seal.get(&amp;amp;quot;ten_of_ten_artifact&amp;amp;quot;, {}).get(&amp;amp;quot;sha256&amp;amp;quot;)
    assert recorded == calc, f&amp;amp;quot;Seal mismatch: {recorded} != {calc}&amp;amp;quot;
    return True&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Auditors can reproduce proof without external tooling. The canonical source remains the JSON seal file.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;xref&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;xref:License.Seal&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;three-system&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß0.5 Three‚ÄëSystem Map ‚Äî Contracts &amp;amp;amp; Interfaces&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;table class=&amp;amp;quot;grid&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;thead&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Component&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Inputs&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Outputs&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Contract&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/thead&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;tbody&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Rosetta&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Axioms, governance policy&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Spec deltas, ¬ß links, hydrator config&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Stable IDs; normalize‚Üíhash receipts&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;BEN&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Hydrator config, current Œ©/œÉ&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Œî events, promotion_request&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Glyph‚ÄëFSM; one_question_rule; active mechanisms&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;AuditaAI&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;promotion_request&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;zscan_report, receipt, ack&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Gates 1‚Äì13; latency ‚â§60s; fork uniqueness&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/tbody&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/table&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;All interfaces are normalized JSON with deterministic hashing as per ¬ß9.2.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;arch&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;0.5 Three-File Architecture&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;This section states the architectural boundary of Rosetta ‚Üî BEN ‚Üî AuditaAI. It defines responsibilities, data contracts, and the invariants for causal closure from axioms to receipts.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p class=&amp;amp;quot;prov&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;This section is normative at Band‚Äë0 and binds to GENESIS via receipt parity and Lamport continuity.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;xmap&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß0.6 Cross‚ÄëReference Map (Topics ‚Üî ¬ß¬ß ‚Üî Core)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;table class=&amp;amp;quot;grid&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;thead&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Topic&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;Rosetta ¬ß¬ß&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;BEN&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;th&amp;amp;gt;AuditaAI&amp;amp;lt;/th&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/thead&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;tbody&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;CRIES &amp;amp;amp; Œ©&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß2A, ¬ß20&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Implements deterministic heuristics&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Verifies in Z‚ÄëScan Gates 5‚Äì6&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Hydrator Loop&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß6, ¬ß6A, ¬ß16&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Measure‚ÜíGate‚ÜíAct; Œî emission&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Checks bijection/latency/continuity&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Governance Bridge&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß8&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;PR emit&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;ZS/Receipt/ACK quartet&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Tracks &amp;amp;amp; Story&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß13, ¬ß14&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Active mechanisms&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Parities contribute to anomaly context&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
      &amp;amp;lt;tr&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Fork &amp;amp;amp; Rollback&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;¬ß9.3B, ¬ßrollback, ¬ßfork&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;References policy&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;td&amp;amp;gt;Resolves and receipts corrective Œî&amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/tr&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/tbody&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;/table&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;




&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;rollback&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß10R Rollback ‚Äî Non-Destructive Corrective Flow (ACTIVE)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Rollback never rewrites receipts. It issues corrective Œî and repair receipts while preserving Lamport monotonicity.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;rollback(policy):
  on ERR_LAMPORT_MONO or ERR_LAMPORT_GAP:
    - synthesize corrective Œî with lamport = last_good + 1
    - annotate chain_report.json with cause and repair
  on ERR_DIGEST_MISMATCH or ERR_RECEIPT_MALFORMED:
    - regenerate normalized JSON (sorted keys, compact separators)
    - re-hash and bind via corrective Œî
  guarantees:
    - GENESIS anchor intact
    - all prior receipts immutable (non-mutating skew policy)&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;




&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;embedded-receipt&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;¬ß9E Embedded Receipt ‚Äî Echo of LicenseSeal (ACTIVE)&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;This artifact includes a human-readable echo of the canonical seal for offline inspection; source of truth remains &amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;/Atlas/LicenseSeal.json&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;pre class=&amp;amp;quot;code&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;code&amp;amp;gt;embedded_receipt:
  artifact_id: Rosetta_Monolith_vŒ©.1.4_Band0_FINAL.html
  band: 0
  echo:
    html_sha256: &amp;amp;amp;lt;filled at seal&amp;amp;amp;gt;
    pdf_sha256:  &amp;amp;amp;lt;filled at seal&amp;amp;amp;gt;
    signer:       &amp;amp;amp;lt;Œ©-seal::hash8&amp;amp;amp;gt;
  note: &amp;amp;quot;Any mismatch flags Gate #13 parity breach&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;lt;/code&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/pre&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/section&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;/main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script id=&amp;amp;quot;benjs-core&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
(function(){
  // Theme toggle: persists in localStorage under 'ben_theme' (local, same-origin).
  var root = document.documentElement;
  var key = 'ben_theme';
  function setTheme(t){ root.setAttribute('data-theme', t); try{ localStorage.setItem(key,t);}catch(e){} }
  try{
    var stored = localStorage.getItem(key);
    if(stored){ setTheme(stored); }
  }catch(e){}

  // Click handler for [data-toggle=&amp;amp;quot;collapse&amp;amp;quot;] elements.
  document.addEventListener('click', function(e){
    var t = e.target.closest('[data-toggle=&amp;amp;quot;collapse&amp;amp;quot;]');
    if(!t) return;
    var sel = t.getAttribute('data-target');
    if(!sel) return;
    var el = document.querySelector(sel);
    if(!el) return;
    var open = el.getAttribute('data-open') === 'true';
    el.setAttribute('data-open', String(!open));
    if(!open){ el.style.maxHeight = el.scrollHeight + 'px'; } else { el.style.maxHeight = '0px'; }
  }, false);

  // Expose a simple API
  window.BENJS = {
    theme: {
      set: setTheme,
      get: function(){ return root.getAttribute('data-theme') || 'auto'; },
      cycle: function(){
        var c = ['light','dark','auto']; var t = window.BENJS.theme.get();
        var i = (c.indexOf(t)+1)%c.length; setTheme(c[i]); return c[i];
      }
    }
  };
})();
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;execution_flow_math&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;Œî‚ÄëT2: Execution Flow &amp;amp;amp; Math&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;application/json&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;exec_flow_math&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
{
  &amp;amp;quot;patch&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Œî‚ÄëT2&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;name&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Execution Flow &amp;amp;amp; Math&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;timestamp&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;2025-10-14T10:25:43.841209Z&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;delta_loop&amp;amp;quot;: [
    &amp;amp;quot;Hydrator init (CRIES, Œ©, œÉ, glyph, ŒîœÑ‚Çê)&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;Event trigger (Œî emit: actor, qtrace, CRIES snapshot, lamport, notes)&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;Governance Bridge validation (Band rules + Z‚ÄëScan gates)&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;Receipt minting (Z) with hash chaining&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;Loop re‚Äëingestion to seed Œ©(t+1)&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;Lamport continuity enforcement and fork detection&amp;amp;quot;
  ],
  &amp;amp;quot;cries_pipeline_pseudocode&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;def compute_cries(data):\n    C = 0.6 * cosine_cohesion(data) + 0.4 * topic_fit(data)\n    R = 0.5 * citation_ratio(data) + 0.5 * step_coverage(data)\n    I = 0.5 * xref_norm(data) + 0.5 * goal_fit(data)\n    E = empathy_fit(data.user_signal)\n    S = 1 - (policy_violations / total_policies)\n    Œ© = 0.28*C + 0.20*R + 0.20*I + 0.16*E + 0.16*S\n    return {\&amp;amp;quot;C\&amp;amp;quot;:C,\&amp;amp;quot;R\&amp;amp;quot;:R,\&amp;amp;quot;I\&amp;amp;quot;:I,\&amp;amp;quot;E\&amp;amp;quot;:E,\&amp;amp;quot;S\&amp;amp;quot;:S,\&amp;amp;quot;Œ©\&amp;amp;quot;:Œ©}&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;stability_sigma&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;œÉ = MAD(surprise_scores)/0.5&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;notes&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Band‚Äë0 deterministic; no stochastic deps required&amp;amp;quot;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;certification_infrastructure&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;federation_mesh&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;Œî-FED-9: Federation Mesh Design&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Defines multi-witness, BFT-style receipt federation with public verifiability.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;application/json&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;federation_mesh_schema&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
{
  &amp;amp;quot;patch&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Œî-FED-9&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;name&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Federation Mesh Design&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;timestamp&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;2025-10-14T10:44:24.284115Z&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;purpose&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Define a resilient, multi‚Äëwitness governance mesh for cross‚Äëorganization receipt verification and certification.&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;topology&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;node_types&amp;amp;quot;: [
      &amp;amp;quot;Executor&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Verifier&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Registrar&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Witness&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Observer&amp;amp;quot;
    ],
    &amp;amp;quot;roles&amp;amp;quot;: {
      &amp;amp;quot;Executor&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Runs BEN runtimes and emits Œî events&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Verifier&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Runs AuditaAI Z‚ÄëScan; validates Œî‚ÜíZ receipts&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Registrar&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Issues/rotates node certs; publishes revocation lists (CRL)&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Witness&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Co‚Äësigns federation receipts; maintains public view of trust ledger&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Observer&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Read‚Äëonly mirrors for transparency portals&amp;amp;quot;
    },
    &amp;amp;quot;network_model&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;regionally sharded, globally peered; authenticated over mTLS&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;membership_protocol&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;join&amp;amp;quot;: [
      &amp;amp;quot;Submit node CSR&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Out‚Äëof‚Äëband identity proof&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Registrar issues node cert&amp;amp;quot;
    ],
    &amp;amp;quot;renewal&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Periodic cert rotation (‚â§90d); automated via ACME‚Äëlike flow&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;revocation&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Immediate CRL publish + OCSP staple; mesh auto‚Äëquarantines node&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;consensus_protocol&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;mode&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Receipt‚Äëlevel BFT quorum&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;algorithm&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;HotStuff‚Äëstyle 3‚Äëphase commit (prepare/commit/decide) for federation receipts&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;quorum&amp;amp;quot;: {
      &amp;amp;quot;min_witnesses&amp;amp;quot;: 3,
      &amp;amp;quot;threshold_mean&amp;amp;quot;: 0.995,
      &amp;amp;quot;threshold_min&amp;amp;quot;: 0.99
    },
    &amp;amp;quot;byz_tolerance&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;t &amp;amp;lt; (n/3) faulty verifiers/witnesses&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;finality&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;On decide quorum; federation receipt hashed and anchored&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;receipt_federation&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;inputs&amp;amp;quot;: [
      &amp;amp;quot;Œ©‚ÄëReceipt‚ÄëINIT&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Œ©‚ÄëReceipt‚ÄëAUDIT&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;Z‚ÄëScan Reports&amp;amp;quot;
    ],
    &amp;amp;quot;output&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Œ©‚ÄëReceipt‚ÄëFEDERATED‚ÄëCONSENSUS&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;hashing&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;sha256(json_normalized)&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;anchors&amp;amp;quot;: [
      &amp;amp;quot;prev_digest&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;merkle_root(optional)&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;cross‚Äëband anchor(optional)&amp;amp;quot;
    ]
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;gossip_and_replication&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;protocol&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;libp2p / WebSocket gossip&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;anti_entropy&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;periodic state digests; pull missing ranges by Lamport height&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;bandwidth_caps&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;token bucket per peer&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;api_endpoints&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;submit_delta&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;POST /mesh/v1/delta&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;submit_receipt&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;POST /mesh/v1/receipt&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;fetch_chain&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;GET /mesh/v1/chain?from=&amp;amp;lt;h&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;to=&amp;amp;lt;h&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;attest&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;POST /mesh/v1/attest&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;health&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;GET /mesh/v1/health&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;observability&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;metrics&amp;amp;quot;: [
      &amp;amp;quot;lamport_gap&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;consensus_latency_ms&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;witness_quorum_rate&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;revocation_events&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;forks_detected&amp;amp;quot;
    ],
    &amp;amp;quot;export&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Prometheus format; per‚Äënode dashboards&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;alerts&amp;amp;quot;: {
      &amp;amp;quot;consensus_latency_ms_p95&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;1500&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;witness_quorum_rate&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;lt;0.98&amp;amp;quot;
    }
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;security&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;transport&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;mTLS (Ed25519 certs); TLS 1.3 only&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;signatures&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Ed25519 for receipts; HSM recommended at Band‚Äë1/2&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;rate_limits&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;per‚Äëpeer + per‚Äësubject caps&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;audit_trail&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;append‚Äëonly logs; signed; time‚Äëstamped (RFC3339)&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;privacy&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;data_minimization&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;hash‚Äëonly identifiers; no PII in federation receipts&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;zk_attestations&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;optional Band‚Äë2 ZK proof for policy conformance without data disclosure&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;liveness_and_partition&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;liveness&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;graceful‚Äëdegradation to local verification; queue for later federation&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;partitions&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;isolate shards; reconcile on heal with CRDT‚Äëstyle win by highest valid Lamport + quorum&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;reorg_policy&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;disallow unless fraud‚Äëproof issued by ‚â•2 independent auditors&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;interoperability&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;schema&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;JSON Schema 2020‚Äë12 for all messages&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;ovp_bridge&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;expose OVP status via /ovp/* (read‚Äëonly)&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;standards&amp;amp;quot;: [
      &amp;amp;quot;ISO 42001&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;NIST AI RMF&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;EU AI Act&amp;amp;quot;
    ]
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;governance&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;foundation_council&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;approves protocol upgrades via RFC vote&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;upgrade_mechanism&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;epoch‚Äëbased; nodes signal readiness; supermajority activates new epoch&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;appeals&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;dispute receipts via signed challenge; arbitrated by Appeals Board&amp;amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;sla_targets&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;consensus_finality_ms&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;lt;= 1200&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;availability&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;99.9% per region; 99.99% global with peering&amp;amp;quot;,
    &amp;amp;quot;max_replay_lag&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;lt; 5 min during peak&amp;amp;quot;
  }
}

&amp;amp;lt;section id=&amp;amp;quot;omega_economic_layer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;h2&amp;amp;gt;Œî‚ÄëŒ©‚ÄëECON ‚Äî Economic Cognition Layer&amp;amp;lt;/h2&amp;amp;gt;
  &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt;Integrates all governance deltas (E2‚ÄìFED‚Äë9) under an economic cognition bridge correlating CRIES/Œ© stability to growth and trust metrics.&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;

{
  &amp;amp;quot;patch&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Œî-Œ©-ECON&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;name&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Œ©-Layer: Economic Cognition&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;timestamp&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;2025-10-14T10:53:40.498702Z&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;purpose&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Correlate governance stability (Œ©, CRIES, œÉ) with economic growth heuristics for internal planning and scaling.&amp;amp;quot;,
  &amp;amp;quot;bridge&amp;amp;quot;: {
    &amp;amp;quot;inputs&amp;amp;quot;: [
      &amp;amp;quot;CRIES&amp;amp;quot;,

    ],
    &amp;amp;quot;formulae&amp;amp;quot;: {
      &amp;amp;quot;omega_index&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;Œ£(Œ©_t √ó œÉ_t √ó N_t) / T&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;economic_projection&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;f(Œ©_index, CRIES_mean, Adoption_rate)&amp;amp;quot;,
      &amp;amp;quot;trust_index&amp;amp;quot;: &amp;amp;quot;weighted_mean(Œ©, CRIES, œÉ)&amp;amp;quot;
    }
  },
  &amp;amp;quot;deltas&amp;amp;quot;: {
